name: Acid Stone
effect: Increases ACID damage by 10% and ACID Resistance by 15%.

name: Ahanae Crystal
effect: Deal 5% additional damage for each Status Effect the target is suffering from.

name: Akari War Band
effect: Perfect Dodges increase Critical Chance by 15% and Critical Damage by 15% for 15s.

name: Alchemy Stone
effect: Increases base Lifesteal by 5% while suffering from a negative STATUS or BLIGHT Effect.

name: Alumni Ring
effect: Increases all Elemental damage dealt by 10%.

name: Amber Moonstone
effect: When the wearer's Health drops below 30%, all incoming damage is reduced by 25% and wearer becomes immune to Temporary Status Effects.

name: Anastasija's Inspiration
effect: When receiving healing effects, gain HASTE for 10s.

name: Archer's Crest
effect: Increases Projectile Speed by 20% and Decreases Weapon Charge Time by 25%.

name: Assassin's Seal

name: Band Band
effect: Icreases Speed of Revive and being Revived by 35%. Increases Downed Health and Downed Movement Speed by 100%.

name: Band of Accord

name: Berserker's Crest
effect: Increases Melee Charge Speed by 20% and reduces Melee Stamina Cost by 25%.

name: Bisected Ring
effect: Gain Infinite Stamina. All damage received is increased by 25%.

name: Black Cat Band
effect: When taking fatal damage, instead of dying, the wearer's Health will drop to 1, and Movement Speed will increase by 25% for 10s. 2m cooldown.

name: Black Pawn Stamp
effect: Reduces Cooldowns of Skills by 10%.

name: Blackout Ring

name: Blasting Cap Ring
effect: Increases Explosive damage by 10%.

name: Blessed Ring

name: Blood Jewel
effect: Charged Melee Attacks apply BLEEDING, dealing 460 BLEED damage over 20s.

name: Blood Tinged Ring
effect: Gain 2 Health Regeneration per second when within 10m of a BLEEDING entity.

name: Booster Ring
effect: Increases all Status Resistances by 10.

name: Braided Thorns
effect: After killing an enemy, gain 15% increased Critical Chance for 10s.

name: Bright Steel Ring
effect: Gives the wearer the fastest evade roll regardless of their Armor Encumbrance.

name: Burden of the Audacious
effect: Decreases all healing by 75%. Perfect Dodges heal for 15% of Max Health.

name: Burden of the Destroyer
effect: Decreases Ideal Range of all Firearms by 25%. Increases all damage dealt by 15%.

name: Burden of the Divine
effect: All damage dealt by wearer is reduced by 10%. 50% of self healing applies to allies.

name: Burden of the Follower
effect: Reduces Fire Rate by 15%. Increases Mod Power Generation by 50%.

name: Burden of the Gambler
effect: Disables Weakspots. Increases Critical Chance by 10% and Critical Damage by 20%.

name: Burden of the Mariner
effect: Increases Skill Cooldowns by 25%. Generate 10% additional Mod Power for each Skill on Cooldown.

name: Burden of the Rebel
effect: Reduces Skill Cooldowns by 15% but decreases Relic Use Speed by 25%.

name: Burden of the Stargazer
effect: Reduces Skill Cooldowns by 15%. Activating a Skill costs 15% Health.

name: Burden of the Warlock
effect: Reduces Mod Power Requirement by 15%. Activating a Mod costs 15% Health as Grey Health. Activation cannot kill wearer.

name: Captain's Insignia
effect: Increases Revive Speed and Relic Consume Speed by 25% per downed or dead ally. Max 2 stacks.

name: Cataloger's Jewel
effect: Automatically generates 8 Mod Power per second.

name: Celerity Stone
effect: Increases Consumable and Relic Use Speed by 20%.

name: Compulsion Loop
effect: After killing an enemy, gain 5% Fire Rate and Melee Attack Speed for 7s. Stacks 3x.

name: Conservation Seal

name: Constant Variable Ring

name: Dead King's Memento

name: Deceiver's Band

name: Deep Pocket Ring

name: Defensive Action Loop

name: Dense Silicon Ring

name: Endaira's Endless Loop

name: Fire Stone

name: Restriction Cord
